# scalingo_private_network_domain (Data Source)

Resource representing a the private network domains of an application



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app` (String) ID of the targeted application

### Optional

- `page` (Number) Page number to retrieve
- `page_size` (Number) Number of items per page

### Read-Only

- `domains` (List of String) List of private network domains attached to the application
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
